name: Song of Yosef
description: Help Yosef recover all of the letters of his scroll in this fast-paced, retro style "metroidvania" adventure. Inspired by the Commodore64 classics that the author grew up with, Song of Yosef joins platform gaming physics with adventure and exploration. Smash sock puppets and other foes, unlock new areas by collecting abilities and becoming more powerful, and slide your way to victory.
